name: OCKAnyTask
desc: A protocol that allows you to query and display a custom task data type.

items.name: var id: String
items.desc: A human-readable unique identifier that is never shown to a user.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: A string that represents this task to the patient.

items.name: var instructions: String?
items.desc: A string that provides user instructions about how to perform a task.

items.name: var schedule: OCKSchedule
items.desc: The dates and times when the task occurs.

items.name: var impactsAdherence: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether your app factors completion of this task into the patientâ€™s overall adherence.

items.name: var notes: [OCKNote]?
items.desc: An array of notes associated with the task object.

items.name: var groupIdentifier: String?
items.desc: A user-defined group identifier you can use to query and sort results.

items.name: var remoteID: String?
items.desc: A string value that represents a unique identifier, which a remote database uses optionally.

items.name: func belongs(to: OCKAnyCarePlan) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a task belongs to a specific care plan.
